subject: feat: complete input field configs for all transaction models
body:
Added all missing input fields to inputFields.ts:
- Model 2: licence terms, territory, source code access, useful lives
- Model 3: project duration, personnel FTEs/costs, IP contributions
- Model 4: operating costs, revenue estimates, transfer timing
- Model 5: payment terms, maintenance costs
- Model 6: support costs

Also added researchPhaseCost and developmentPhaseCost to common fields.
